text: BELLA Hadid looked confident and unconcerned as she hit the Paris Haute Couture catwalk with her boobs on display. The 20 - year - old reality star turned - model was one of the ladies showing off designs in the French capital on Tuesday. She was strutting in front of invited guests at the Alexandre Vauthier show, Runway, Fall Winter 2017, Haute Couture Fashion Week show. At one point in the show, Bella had been dressed in a sheet navy top that left nothing to the imagination. The completely see - through material showed off her breasts for all to see.
